# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by both myself and you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it's a great investment for anyone looking to enhance their experience. I am offering this exceptional item to you for $145, a special deal considering its original value. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something truly special at an attractive price. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $145. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $145
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
